Top-3 Similar Questions: su_565665: How to set the time temporarily in Linux
so_18978052: Set the date/time for a python script in linux
Top-3 Scripts:
su_565665: faketime '2013-03-14 08:25:30' ./your_program

aptitude download faketime
mkdir /tmp/faket/ dpkg-deb --extract faketime*.deb /tmp/faket
cp /tmp/faket/usr/bin/faketime ~
cp /tmp/faket/usr/lib/faketime/* ~
cd
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH="$LD_LIBRARY_PATH:."
./faketime '2013-03-14 08:25:30' ./your_program
